video.title: Guess How Much I Love You
video.synopsis: A little nutbrown hare and his father discover the whimsy and wonder of their world as they explore meadows, forests and streams with their friends.

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse innocently pick flowers, only to realize the butterflies need them. / Little Nutbrown Hare builds a nest.
episodes.title: Field of Flowers / The Nest

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare awakens to a delightful smell. / Inspired by a story, Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse set out to touch a star.
episodes.title: The Scents of Spring / Can You Touch the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a treasure hunt. / Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather, but a cheeky bird flies away with it.
episodes.title: Treasure Hunt / Feather Your Nest

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare is disappointed when ants take his berries. / Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse go on a hunt for blue treasures.
episodes.title: March Like an Ant / Blue Wonder

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare discovers how wonderful all his friends' homes are. / Little Nutbrown Hare wishes he were as big and smart as his father.
episodes.title: No Place Like Home / Big Like You

episodes.synopsis: Little Field Mouse is excited to show off her new flower. / Little Nutbrown Hare and Big Nutbrown Hare have fun skipping stones and throwing sticks.
episodes.title: Favorite Thing / Where Does the River Go?

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare and his pals ask Little White Owl to tell a bedtime story. / A storm sweeps across the valley, sending the friends into a cave.
episodes.title: Bedtime Story / Big Storm

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare awakens to find the leaves changing color and falling off the trees. / Little Nutbrown Hare wishes he could fly.
episodes.title: Autumn's Here / I Want to Fly

episodes.synopsis: The Nutbrown Hares are both having trouble sleeping. / Little Nutbrown Hare can't find his way around now that everything is covered by snow.
episodes.title: What Sound Does the Moon Make? / Snow Blanket

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse look at snowflakes. / Little Nutbrown Hare is fascinated that Little Gray Squirrel is going to hibernate.
episodes.title: Snowflake / Inside Day

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare tries ice skating. / Seeing his tracks in the fresh snow inspires Little Nutbrown Hare to create a new game.
episodes.title: Slip Slop Slide / Where's Little Redwood Fox?

episodes.synopsis: Big Nutbrown Hare remembers a cherry tree from his youth. / Big Nutbrown Hare teaches Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends to play hide-and-seek.
episodes.title: Blossoms / Hide n Seek

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare befriends a fluffy yellow creature by the river. / Little Nutbrown Hare watches as Blue Bird’s eggs hatch.
episodes.title: Follow Me / Fly the Nest

episodes.synopsis: A ladybug lands on Little Nutbrown Hare and seems to want to stay with him. / Little Nutbrown Hare discovers a tree full of bright, tasty plums.
episodes.title: Fly Away Home / Plum Summer

episodes.synopsis: The weather and wind make it hard for the friends to play any one game. / Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very peculiar green "something."
episodes.title: Four Seasons / Chestnut

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare befriends a shy deer. / The friends dress up in disguises to surprise one another.
episodes.title: New Friend / Surprise!

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare can't wait for winter to end. / Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse go on a trip with Big Nutbrown Hare to find food.
episodes.title: Winter Surprises / Lucky Stick

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare has a hard time forgiving Little Field Mouse for knocking down his tree. / Deep snow forces Little Nutbrown Hare to stay at home.
episodes.title: It's Okay / Snow White Hare

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse want to run and play, but the summer day is just too hot. / Little Nutbrown Hare wants a long tail.
episodes.title: Leaf Shade / A Hare's Tail

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse seek shelter from the rain. / Little Nutbrown Hare is impressed by Blue Bird's description of a field.
episodes.title: Rainy Days / Hare’s Eye View

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare wants to create a story, but doing so is harder than he thought. / Little Nutbrown Hare tries to be Big Nutbrown Hare for a day.
episodes.title: Taste of Sunset / You for a Day

episodes.synopsis: A fun, spooky tale from Little White Owl leaves the friends a little on edge. / Little Redwood Fox inadvertently spoils all the friends' games.
episodes.title: Pumpkin Patch / All Fall Down

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare tries to trick Big Nutbrown Hare. / Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that everyone can whistle but him.
episodes.title: Shadow Play / Wind Whistle

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare tries to jump high enough to reach autumn's last apple. / Little Gray Squirrel leaves his pile of spotted acorns unattended.
episodes.title: The Big Apple / Finders Keepers

episodes.synopsis: Little Nutbrown Hare has grown a winter coat. / Little Nutbrown Hare accidentally promises to play with two different friends on the same day.
episodes.title: Winter Coat / I Promise

episodes.synopsis: Little Field Mouse finds a rock, and Little Nutbrown Hare wants one, too. / Little Nutbrown Hare wants to show Big Nutbrown Hare something special.
episodes.title: Hidden Treasures / Moon Dance
